Class UserActivityDAO

java.lang.Object
DataBase.dao.UserActivityDAO
public class UserActivityDAO extends Object
Data Access Object for user activity tracking.

Manages all activity records related to subscribers and guests, including reservations, waiting list entries, terminal lookups, and lost confirmation-code recovery.

      public UserActivityDAO()

  • Method Details

    • insertActivity

      public static void insertActivity(String subscriberUsername, String guestPhone, String guestEmail, Integer reservationId, Integer waitingId, Timestamp activityDate) throws Exception
      Inserts a new user activity record.

      Used when creating a reservation or waiting-list entry. Supports both subscribers and guests (nullable fields allowed).

      Parameters:
      subscriberUsername - subscriber username (nullable)
      guestPhone - guest phone number (nullable)
      guestEmail - guest email address (nullable)
      reservationId - linked reservation ID (nullable)
      waitingId - linked waiting-list ID (nullable)
      activityDate - activity timestamp
      Throws:
      Exception - on database error

    • insertActivity

      public static void insertActivity(Connection conn, String subscriberUsername, String guestPhone, String guestEmail, Integer reservationId, Integer waitingId, Timestamp activityDate) throws Exception
      Inserts a user activity record using an existing connection.

      Intended for transactional flows where activity creation must be committed or rolled back together with other operations.

      Parameters:
      conn - active database connection
      subscriberUsername - subscriber username (nullable)
      guestPhone - guest phone (nullable)
      guestEmail - guest email (nullable)
      reservationId - reservation ID (nullable)
      waitingId - waiting-list ID (nullable)
      activityDate - activity timestamp
      Throws:
      Exception - on database error

    • insertWaitingActivity

      public static void insertWaitingActivity(int waitingId, String email, String phone) throws Exception
      Inserts a waiting-list activity for a guest.
      Parameters:
      waitingId - waiting-list ID
      email - guest email
      phone - guest phone
      Throws:
      Exception - on database error

    • insertSubscriberWaitingActivity

      public static void insertSubscriberWaitingActivity(int waitingId, String subscriberUsername) throws Exception
      Inserts a waiting-list activity for a subscriber.
      Parameters:
      waitingId - waiting-list ID
      subscriberUsername - subscriber username
      Throws:
      Exception - on database error

    • insertWaitingActivityReturnActivityId

      public static int insertWaitingActivityReturnActivityId(Connection conn, int waitingId, String email, String phone) throws Exception
      Inserts a waiting-list activity and returns the generated activity ID.

      Used when the caller needs to link further records to this activity.

      Parameters:
      conn - active database connection
      waitingId - waiting-list ID
      email - guest email
      phone - guest phone
      Returns:
      generated activity ID, or -1 if not available
      Throws:
      Exception - on database error

    • findActiveCodeByContact

      public static UserActivityDAO.LostCodeResult findActiveCodeByContact(String contact) throws Exception
      Finds the most relevant active confirmation code by contact details.

      Priority order: 1) ASSIGNED waiting list (urgent) 2) Closest upcoming active reservation 3) Latest waiting-list entry still WAITING Works for both guests and subscribers.

      Parameters:
      contact - email or phone number
      Returns:
      LostCodeResult or null if nothing active found
      Throws:
      Exception - on database error

    • findActiveCodeBySubscriberUsername

      public static UserActivityDAO.ActiveCodeResult findActiveCodeBySubscriberUsername(String subscriberUsername) throws Exception
      Finds the most relevant active confirmation code for a subscriber.

      Priority: 1) ASSIGNED waiting list 2) Closest upcoming active reservation 3) Latest waiting-list entry

      Parameters:
      subscriberUsername - subscriber username
      Returns:
      ActiveCodeResult or null if none found
      Throws:
      Exception - on database error

    • listActiveItemsBySubscriberUsername

      public static List<TerminalActiveItemDTO> listActiveItemsBySubscriberUsername(String subscriberUsername) throws Exception
      Lists all active items for a subscriber.

      Includes: - ASSIGNED waiting-list entries - Active reservations (CONFIRMED / PENDING / ARRIVED) - WAITING waiting-list entries Results are ordered by urgency and time.

      Parameters:
      subscriberUsername - subscriber username
      Returns:
      list of active terminal items
      Throws:
      Exception - on database error
